newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares end mixed in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares end mixed in continuous trade.

text.p: Budimex rose, Stalexport fell, BIG, Rolimpex and Universal were flat in Warsaw continuous trade on Tuesday.
The remaining five stocks did not trade. Total turnover amounted to 0.7 million zlotys. NFI units rose in 21.7-million zloty turnover.
The continuous trading system, which currently lists 10 companies, is separate from the bourse's main single-price auction system in which the same firms and 70 others are traded.
At the single-price auction session most stocks fell and the main market's index fell 1.7 percent.
